name: New Balance 530 Silver Metallic Polka Dots

details.description:
The New Balance 530 White Silver Navy features a white mesh upper with metallic silver and white leather overlays. On the quarter panel, a grey New Balance logo outlined in navy adds contrast. From there, a white and grey ABZORB sole adds the finishing touch.

The New Balance 530 White Silver Navy released in February of 2021 and retailed for $95.

The New Balance 530 White Black Details is a colorway part of the New Balance Brand Collection.

These athletic shoes include ABZORB technology with a rubber sole. The top is made of durable synthetic leather and mesh. These New Balance sneakers have traditional laces, a drag strip, and a protective toe cap. They also combine an ENCAP midsole with a suede, leather, and mesh upper. Further, they feature an all-white perforated mesh upper sole with a black padded insole. It displays the black "N" logo on its side with the "530" writing near its heel.

The New Balance 530 White Black Details debuted on March 28, 2022, and retailed at a price of $120.

The New Balance 530 Classic Black Gray is a technical running shoe that finds inspiration in classic sneaker designs from the New Balance catalog.

One of the first things you notice is the overlapping overlays that come in Classic Black, gray, and Metallic Silver. They’re constructed from leather and suede, and create a sense of movement across the upper due to the line designs. The upper is made of breathable mesh in Classic Black, while the tongue boasts a combination of mesh and synthetic materials. In terms of technology, an ABZORB midsole provides responsive cushioning and gives the sneaker a slightly bulky silhouette. This feature is similar to elements on early 2000s running shoes.

Our StockX experts like the application of Classic Black on the rubber outsole because it contrasts the white midsole. The New Balance 530 Classic Black Gray was released on January 30th, 2023, and retailed at $100.

The New Balance 530 Munsell White arrives in a Munsell white and silver metallic colorway.

The New Balance 530 Munsell White has an upper that is crafted from a blend of leather and synthetic materials, making it both durable and lightweight. The shoe features ABZORB cushioning in the midsole for reduced impact. The outsole is constructed from sturdy rubber, making it both grippy and stable. The shoe features "N" branding on the lateral sides and an "NB" logo on the tongue.

The New Balance 530 Munsell White was made available on December 8th, 2020, and sold for a retail price of $100.

The New Balance 530 Silver Cream was released in celebration of the brand’s 30th anniversary.

This model has a cream-toned mesh base with silver and grey synthetic overlays. The "N" logos on the shoe quarters also comes in a silver hue with a black outline. Further branding includes the "NB" text on its padded tongue, also in a silver tone, and a 530 text on the shoe collar. The base is equipped with an ABZORB midsole that provides light cushioning, and completes its design. 

The New Balance 530 Silver Cream was released on the market on January 7th, 2023. It retailed at a price of $100.

The New Balance 530 Raincloud continues the legacy of the original 530 which debuted in 1992. The "Raincloud" takes the performance sneaker’s bulky silhouette and adds a grey-tone color scheme.

The Raincloud, Grey, and White colorway is inspired by the hue of a raincloud just before it pours and is similar to the color scheme found on several New Balance 990s. The sneaker features a breathable mesh upper with soft suede overlays in a complementing grey. The New Balance ‘N’ graces the side panel, while ‘530’ can be found next to the heel overlay. The bulky ABZORB midsole gives the sneaker a ‘90s look and cushions against impact. The rubber outsole provides traction that grips the ground without decreasing flexibility. The "Raincloud" also comes with a padded tongue and collar, which add extra comfort.

Something our StockX experts love is the way the white midsole contrasts the small, black outsole. The New Balance 530 Raincloud was released on June 9, 2023, and retailed at $100.

The New Balance 530 White Pink Sugar dresses the 530 in a spring-inspired colorway of Pink Sugar and bright white.

Inspired by running shoes from New Balance’s early 2000s running catalog, the White Pink Sugar New Balance 530 features an airy mesh base in white with synthetic leather overlays in Pink Sugar, Silver Metallic, and white. The Pink Sugar and Silver Metallic overlays boast a metallic sheen with tonal, reinforced stitching. "NB" branding appears on the padded tongue, while the signature New Balance "N" decorates the mid-panel, and "530" is printed on the overlays. Responsive ABZORB cushioning adds a modern touch to the sneaker’s retro silhouette, while the rubber outsole provides increased traction.

Our experts at StockX like the padding in the collar and tongue, which protects the ankle and pays tribute to classic New Balance running shoes. The New Balance 530 White Pink Sugar was released on March 29, 2024, and sold for $100.

The New Balance 530 Beige Angora is a stylish and comfortable sneaker that is perfect for everyday wear. The shoe features a beige angora colorway that is both versatile and on-trend. The upper is made from a combination of suede and mesh, which provides durability and breathability. The shoe also features a cushioned midsole for added comfort and support. The New Balance 530 Beige Angora was released on December 20, 2022, and has a retail price of $100. This sneaker is a must-have for anyone looking for a comfortable and stylish shoe that can be worn for any occasion.

The New Balance 530 Triple White integrates modern technology with heritage design elements from New Balance’s 2000s catalog.

From the midsole to the lace, the Triple White New Balance 530 boasts an entirely white construction. The mesh underlays feature a loose weave that provides an airy feel, while the overlays offer support and represent a throwback to New Balance’s early 2000s running shoes. Other retro details include the heavy padding in the collar and tongue, the segmented pods in the midsole, and the sneaker’s visible tech aesthetic. However, the responsive Gel technology in the midsole keeps the sneaker contemporary and provides advanced energy return. The lace-up closure secures the fit, while the pull tabs ease entry.

Our experts at StockX like the textured grip tread on the rubber outsole, which provides traction on indoor and outdoor surfaces. The New Balance 530 Triple White was released on November 28, 2023, and sold for $100.

name: New Balance 530 Salehe Bembury Prosperity Be The Prize

details.description:
The New Balance 530 Salehe Bembury Prosperity Be The Prize is a shoe designed as part of a collaboration between the brand and luxury streetwear designer Salehe Bembury.

The Salehe Bembury Prosperity Be The Prize version of the New Balance 530 has an upper made of mesh in a celery-green color. This material makes up the base, while dusty-yellow nubuck leather overlays form the toe cap and cross the sides in curves, supporting the upper. The New Balance N makes an appearance on each side in gray with a fingerprint pattern inside, while the lateral heel contains 530 and Salehe Bembury branding. The heel is supported by yellow overlays and has a pull tab, while the tongue contains more NB branding. The shoe sits on a light-brown midsole with ABZORB cushioning and a purple outsole.

What stands out about this sneaker is the bold color scheme—the mix of green, yellow, red, and purple is truly eye catching. The New Balance 530 Salehe Bembury Prosperity Be The Prize was released on October 29, 2024, for $150.

name: New Balance 530 Sea Salt Mercury Red

details.description: The New Balance 530 Sea Salt Mercury Red is a stylish and comfortable sneaker that combines classic design with modern aesthetics. Featuring a sleek silhouette, this shoe showcases a harmonious blend of sea salt and mercury red hues, creating a visually striking appearance. The upper is crafted with high-quality materials, ensuring durability and breathability for all-day wear. Designed for both style and functionality, the New Balance 530 offers excellent cushioning and support. The ENCAP midsole technology provides superior comfort and stability, making it ideal for everyday use. With its versatile color scheme and timeless design, this sneaker effortlessly complements a wide range of outfits, from casual to semi-formal attire. Us at StockX believe this product is great for those seeking a perfect balance between fashion-forward design and practical comfort in their footwear.

name: New Balance 530 Silver Metallic Raincloud Polka Dots

details.description:
The New Balance 530 Brown Tan is a stylish and versatile sneaker that combines comfort with a trendy aesthetic. Featuring a rich brown and tan colorway, this shoe offers a sophisticated look that easily transitions from casual to semi-formal occasions. The upper is crafted with a mix of premium materials, including suede and mesh, providing both durability and breathability for all-day wear.

Designed with New Balance's signature cushioning technology, the 530 model ensures superior comfort and support for your feet. The chunky midsole not only adds to the shoe's retro-inspired silhouette but also provides excellent shock absorption for a smooth stride. With its timeless design and earthy tones, the New Balance 530 Brown Tan is a perfect addition to any wardrobe, effortlessly complementing a wide range of outfits. Us at StockX believe this product is great for those seeking a balance between style and comfort in their everyday footwear.

The New Balance 530 Sea Salt Moonbeam, inspired by retro aesthetics, embraces a laid-back style crafted with lightweight mesh uppers, durable synthetic overlays, and the iconic ABZORB midsole for both support and comfort.

With a palette of pastel beige tones adorning the uppers, the Sea Salt Moonbeam New Balance 530 achieves a stylish Y2K aesthetic, featuring a synthetic overlay and breathable mesh. Enhanced with plush ABZORB cushioning underfoot, a technology engineered to absorb impact effectively, and robust traction rubber outsoles, these running shoes showcase the brand's unmistakable "N" logos along the sidewalls. Additional brand detailing includes the "NB" tongue patch, the "530" tag on the lateral side, and the "N" logo on the toe.

The standout characteristic of the New Balance 530 Sea Salt Moonbeam lies in its remarkable ABZORB cushioning underfoot. This feature, designed to absorb impact, ensures unparalleled comfort for the wearer, making these shoes ideal for any daily pursuits. The sneaker debuted for $100 on October 10th, 2023.

name: New Balance 530 White Light Gold Metallic

details.description:
The New Balance 530 White Light Gold Metallic is a retro-inspired running shoe from the New Balance 530 lineup in a "Light Gold Metallic" colorway. 

This New Balance 530 features an upper made of a white mesh base with synthetic overlays dressed in Light Metallic Gold and black. Different iterations of New Balance branding appear throughout, including the signature "N" logos on the sides, "530" on the lateral heel, and "NB running" on the tongue. Other details include a heel pull loop, white laces, and a padded mesh lining. The upper is anchored on a white ABZORB midsole atop a black rubber outsole. 

Something we love about this New Balance 530 is its stylish colorway, the combination of durable and breathable materials, and the fusion of heritage design with modern technology, which make it a timeless and versatile sneaker suitable for various occasions, from casual wear to athletic activities. The New Balance 530 White Light Gold Metallic was released on January 18th, 2023, for a retail price of $100.

name: New Balance 530 Sea Salt Marsh Green

details.description:
The New Balance 530 Sea Salt Marsh Green is a sneaky reinterpretation of a shoe that's been around since 1992 and is one of the top performance sneakers with a range of cushioning technologies and a distinctive, versatile and adaptive design.

The sea salt, marsh green 530 by New Balance comes with a mesh upper and synthetic leather overlays designed for airflow and comfort. The sea salt/marsh green colors combine a soft, off-white base with green accents for a clean look that works in various situations. The midsole has ABZORB technology to help with responsive cushioning, while the rubber outsole with its unique tread pattern is there to give you maximum traction, no matter the surface.

The New Balance 530 Sea Salt Marsh Green has a traditional lace-up closure system and comfort-focused technology like the ABZORB cushioning in the midsole. When this shoe was released on June 1st, 2024, it retailed at $100.
